page.title: 14Population
page.content: There are 22 people living in Stowe village, about half the number of fifty years ago. The two tied cottages are empty and the vicarage is now a private house. 17 adults and 5 children live in the farm and remaining five cottages instead of the large families that used to supply labour on the land before the work was mechanised. The Stud Farm and Upper Lurkenhope each support a family of four and Garn Bank two. Unless farmers have sons who are willing to carry on working the land a further decrease in population seems inevitable.
